entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: WNW 70 km/h gust 88 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
